channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large holes in the middle of the green, 17th July
item.description:
On the pond road green there are numerous holes. Big enough that I’ve seen adults and children injure ankles and legs and most recently my dog seriously injured its leg. Can something please be done about them?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Merryfield, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extreme wet dog fouling besides a tree which is in front of 87 Fernhead Road, 17th July
item.description:
Extreme wet dog besides a tree which is in front of 87 Fernhead Road. Fernhead Road is vast becoming the cesspit of W9!! I feel that the Wardens need to look out for these irresponsible individuals!! Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London

item.title: Rotting waste / bins, 17th July
item.description:
A new shop - Life of Fish has been consistently leaving its detritus from the shop outside where is it is a major nuisance. The smell of the wrappers and other materials causes a seriously offensive and anti social environment and destroys the serenity of the street and nearby businesses such as Fika 139 and Day next door. This has been an issue for a number of weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 137, Bellenden Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 17th July
item.description:
We have Communial garages at the back of our properties. People Constantly using it as a dumping ground for bottles and cans, we’ve had microwaves, garden waste, party rubbish bags! we are sick of clearing up! Latest is this fridge freezer and wooden pallet and fridge door!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Fen Grove, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti, 17th July
item.description:
